Desc.eng: Wait! This chest must be the source of the magic. It could be filled with Essence.
On second thought maybe we should leave it here.
Glad to hear that. We always need more of that.
And stillâ€¦ I have a bad feeling about this.
Wait! We have just learned that the Chimera eats raw Essence. What if they all smell it?
What's the worst that could happen? Wait, don't answer that.
I've learned to trust your instincts. I'll leave this chest.
Then we'll take care of them. I won't leave anything like this.
You are right. I don't need a horde of hungry Chimeras. Leave it.
Have you changed your mind? Shall we open the chest?
